    Class: Scrypt

    Constructor Details

    - (void) constructor({N, r, p, c, klass})

    Instance Method Details

    - (void) salsa20_8(B)

    Parameters:

    • B (Uint32Array) — that is 16 words long

    - (void) pbkdf2({key, salt, dkLen, progress_hook}, cb)

    - (void) blockmix_salsa8(B, Y)

    - (void) smix({B, V, XY, progress_hook}, cb)

    smix(B, V, XY): Compute B = SMix_r(B, N). The input B must be 128r bytes in length; the temporary storage V must be 128rN bytes in length; the temporary storage XY must be 256r bytes in length. The value N must be a power of 2.

    - (void) run({key, salt, dkLen, progress_hook}, cb)

    Run Scrypt on the given key and salt to get dKLen of data out.

    containing the output key material bytes.

    Parameters:

    • key (WordArray) — the Passphrase or key to work on
    • salt (WordArray) — the random salt to prevent rainbow tables
    • dkLen (number) — the length of data required out of the key stretcher
    • cb (callback) — the callback to callback when done, called with a WordArray
